title: paradEvi saubhAgya
sahitya:
paradEvi saubhAgya lakSmI mamu pAlimpu


anupallavi

  varadAyaki jayanAyaki vAgIshvari tripurasundari


caraNam    aruNa kiraNa tEjOnmaya anantaguNa cinmayi Atma shakti vilAsini
antarAtma vikAsiini karuNArasa paripUraNi sharaNu vEda vANI
kanikaramuga kaTAkSincu kanaka shuddhAnandavalli
